name: DEMON'S SWORD SNAKES -Sweet Dreams of the Cursed Snake
name_original: DEMON'S SWORD SNAKES -Sweet Dreams of the Cursed Snake
description:
※ All characters in this game is over the age of 18.

A young man, cursed by a succubus, goes out on a journey with a group of girls. However, the journey leads them to an enemy much more fearful than the succubus: a great devil known as the "Snake" - -

In addition to an orthodox story of going on a journey with a group of girls, this male-oriented RPG also mixes the erotic essence of having sex with those girls and unique element of heart-wrenching romances.

Go against the evil curses spread by demons while you have sex with the girls, diligently level up, make weapons and equipment from collected materials, and explore the various interesting things in this fantasy universe.

What shall await you at the end of your journey ......
Seek the destiny awaiting the young man, the girls, and the Snake with your very own eyes.

■ Game System

・Making items and weapons by using the materials you collect.

・Auto-battling features.

・System that combines the skills required for combat.
